channel.title: Juggle War on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle War on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Weekend Schmeekend
item.description: So this weekend was the weekend of roomate house warming parties. It was fun. On friday I went and saw my friends band.. winnie. heh.. which is both the band and my friends name. They played with some other friends of mine.. Tallulah. heh. what a surprise. but anyway. so then after that I went to a friends house warming party. what a night. a bunch of people got naked and ran around.
